entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
